name: @somesmall.studio/rtpmidi
author: Jascha Dachtera <jascha.dachtera@gmail.com>
description: A node js implementation of Apples Network Midi Protocol. Updated by Andrew Mee <primary.edw@gmail.com> to work with later NodeJs Versions. Further updated by jens alexander <jens@somesmall.studio> with immproved mDNS support.
